## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3b47856b6547efd8d456abded39dc3e710dfa04600ceb26aeeffdae16c33aa4f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ifood-faster-remote-config' @ 3.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
